text: {| |} The Breakaway class is a class of cruise ships owned and operated by Norwegian Cruise Line. The first ship of the class, Norwegian Breakaway, launched in 2013. == Ships == {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! As with the original Breakaway class, they are operated exclusively by Norwegian Cruise Line.
